sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, his story is the same. After defeating the Night's King, he obliterated his name from memory. In some versions of the tale, he is the brother of the Night's King.
sections.Biography: According to legend, he allied with [[King-Beyond-the-Wall]] [[Joramun]] do [[Fall of the Night's King|defeat]] the [[Night's King]] and the [[Night's Queen]], freeing the [[Night's Watch]] from their rule.<ref>"[[The Night's Watch (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
